column4: does any of you being able to use the java plugin on firefox? i've upgraded to 1.7.0_7 but it still doenst work
I have jdk1.7.0 installed and followed this instructions: http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/manual-plugin-install-linux-136395.html
you may want to try open-jdk, not oracle jdk
